text: The raspberry ellagitannin is an ellagitannin found in raspberries. It is a polyphenol per se, containing 6 ellagic acid-type components and two additional monomeric phenolics, for a total of 14 gallic acid units (and all of their substituent phenolic hydroxyl groups).Cardiovascular disease and phytochemicals. Anonymous. C. Hamilton et al. == See also == * Sanguiin H-6 * Lambertianin C * Raspberry ketone == References == Category:Ellagitannins Category:Natural phenol trimers ellagitannin
title: Raspberry ellagitannin
